Name: TvhProxy
Overview:
TvhProxy is a small flask app to proxy requests between Plex Media Server and Tvheadend.You have to run this Docker Container as a seperate IP Address. This Function is supportet with UNRAID 6.4[br]
  [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br]
  [b]Port 80:[/b] Must be export as Port 80 [br]
  [b]Port 5004:[/b] Must be export as Port 5004 [br]
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system
